title: Maharashtra Bhushan Award ceremony turns deadly; 11 die, over 600 suffer heatstroke in Kharghar | Navi Mumbai News - Times of India
selftext: A crowd of lakhs sat under a scorching sun for over five hours (8am to 1pm) at the Kharghar International Corporate Park grounds while the award was being conferred on social activist Dattatreya Narayan alias Appasaheb Dharmadhikari. Union home minister Amit Shah, Shinde, deputy chief minister Devendra Fadnavis and Union minister Kapil Patil were on the dais, which was covered, along with other VIPs
comments: They are stupid enough to fall for such a stupid trap that such stupid people set up.

Obviously the organisers are stupid, heartless yadayada... But nobody was forcing them to sit there. You come there, feel the heat in the air and still chose to sit unrpotected from the sun without any incentive, you had it coming
Oh dear son, you don't know what poverty forces people to do

Blind faith and religion

  


People there were devotees of person getting awards, like Sadhguru or ramdev or some xyz. These PPL were kinda instructed to be there, it's stupid but blind faith can make you do this.
